issue.title: www.solawave.co
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.solawave.co](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.solawave.co) ### Comment > Missed analytics/tracker > > `live.visually-io.com` > `fpaudience.com` > > Looks suspicious, but not sure if safe to block > `static.klaviyo.com/onsite/js/telemetry.3cb614e09402feb3b3cf.js` > > To replicate, scroll down to email entry and enter an email (any email) > `amazonaws.com/api/model/shopify/pixel` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ls7g8bkss2ogkw40k4skkwcwwwkwocg3mktkvz7heu.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5l2s8mqe4b8c0sco0sk4gws40wsc8sk6y9vhfdlbhg.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin v1.65.0 System version: | `Windows 10 22H2` Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Custom filters: | `uBO default filters`

Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests Filters: | Ad blocking:

issue.title: com.seasun.snowbreak.google

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.seasun.snowbreak.google

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

`stat.tpns.sgp.tencent.com`
`guid.tpns.sgp.tencent.com`
`xgdata.xoyo.games`

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
